nodes.documentation:
@notice This contract is used as a factory for the escrow contract that will be owned by the borrowers.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: EscrowFactory

nodes.documentation:
@notice It checks whether the platform is paused or not.
@dev It throws a require error if the platform is used.
nodes.name: isNotPaused

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct TellerCommon.Loan memory)

nodes.name: createEscrow
isDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice It adds a new dapp to the factory.
@param dapp address to add in this factory.
nodes.name: addDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice It removes a current dapp from the factory.
@param dapp address to remove.
nodes.name: removeDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets all the dapps in the factory.
@return an array of dapps (addresses).
nodes.name: getDapps

nodes.documentation:
@notice It initializes this escrow contract factory instance.
@param settingsAddress the settings contract address.
nodes.name: initialize
_isDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice This contract is used as a factory for the escrow contract that will be owned by the borrowers.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: EscrowFactory

nodes.documentation:
@notice It checks whether the platform is paused or not.
@dev It throws a require error if the platform is used.
nodes.name: isNotPaused

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct TellerCommon.Loan memory)

nodes.name: createEscrow
isDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice It adds a new dapp to the factory.
@param dapp address to add in this factory.
nodes.name: addDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice It removes a current dapp from the factory.
@param dapp address to remove.
nodes.name: removeDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets all the dapps in the factory.
@return an array of dapps (addresses).
nodes.name: getDapps

nodes.documentation:
@notice It initializes this escrow contract factory instance.
@param settingsAddress the settings contract address.
nodes.name: initialize
_isDapp

params.dapp: address to add in this factory.

params.loanID: loan id to associate to the new escrow instance.
params.loansAddress: address of the loans contract that is creating an escrow.

initialized().return: true if contract is initialized. Otherwise it returns false.

isDapp(address).return: true if the address is a dapp. Otherwise it returns false.

addDapp(address).notice: It adds a new dapp to the factory.

createEscrow(address,uint256).notice: It creates an Escrow contract for a given loan id.

getDapps().notice: Gets all the dapps in the factory.

initialize(address).notice: It initializes this escrow contract factory instance.

initialized().notice: Gets if the contract is initialized.

isDapp(address).notice: It tests whether an address is a dapp or not.

removeDapp(address).notice: It removes a current dapp from the factory.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used as a factory for the escrow contract that will be owned by the borrowers.
